body.name: Sharp 1.1-Cu. Ft. Countertop Microwave Oven, Stainless (Smc1162hs)
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 30 mins.
features: 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven. Auto defrost for quick and accurate thawing. One touch cook buttons include: popcorn, potato, frozen pizza, vegetables, beverage, reheat.

Features Orville Redenbacher's certified popcorn preset tuned for optimal popping results. Express cook for single touch cooking for up to 6 minutes. WARNING: California Proposition 65 Warning. This product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.govSafety Data Sheet.
Convenient +30 key for instant start and adding time. Premium white LED display is easy to read.
Easy-to-use preset buttons for popular foods and beverage. 12.4 in. Carousel turntable for even cooking.
body.description: The Sharp Mid-Size, 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven in stainless steel is specifically tuned to achieve optimal popping results from the leader in microwave popcorn, Orville Redenbacher's. Simply touch the "Popcorn" button to choose the Classic Size (3.3 oz) or Single Serve Mini Bag (1.16 oz) of Orville Redenbacher's Microwave Popcorn. Then sit back and enjoy light and fluffy popcorn with the delicious, buttery flavor of Orville Redenbacher's Gourmet Popping Corn.- 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven.- Features Orville Redenbacher's certified popcorn preset tuned for optimal popping results.- Convenient +30 key for instant start and adding time.- Easy-to-use preset buttons for popular foods and beverage.- Auto defrost for quick and accurate thawing.- Express cook for single touch cooking for up to 6 minutes.- Premium white LED display is easy to read.- 12.4 in. Carousel turntable for even cooking.- One touch cook buttons include: popcorn, potato, frozen pizza, vegetables, beverage, reheat.- WARNING: California Proposition 65 Warning. This product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.govSafety Data Sheet- Sold as 1 Each.The Sharp Mid-Size, 1.1 cu. ft., 1000 Watt microwave oven in stainless steel is specifically tuned to achieve optimal popping results from the leader in microwave popcorn, Orville Redenbacher's. Simply touch the "Popcorn" button to choose the Classic Size (3.3 oz) or Single Serve Mini Bag (1.16 oz) of Orville Redenbacher's Microwave Popcorn. Then sit back and enjoy light and fluffy popcorn with the delicious, buttery flavor of Orville Redenbacher's Gourmet Popping Corn. The SMC1162HS is packed with thoughtful and innovative features. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The microwave may be ok but watch the return! Must be returned to stellar, not free. Mine was more than half the price of the microwave.Update: KART responded to the comment and sent prepaid label for FedEx. Shipping cost is reasonable, being about 15% of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worthless in the dark
reviews.reviewText: Don’t recall reading that this model is not backlit so unless you have constant sunlight is difficult to use and generally a terrible product.
